# AxoHub-BCH Requirements & Setup Guide

## Prerequisites
*   Node.js v18.17.0 or higher
*   npm v9+ or pnpm v8+

## Installation
```bash
npm install
# or
pnpm install
```

## Environment Setup (For Judges)
Create a `.env.local` file in the root directory and paste the following configuration.
These keys are provided for judging purposes only.

```env
# Blockfrost API Key (Preprod Network)
NEXT_PUBLIC_BLOCKFROST_API_KEY=preprodKmW2fKrtZqxUh9Ot3uw0EXu3hApnH6sL

# Cardano Network
NEXT_PUBLIC_CARDANO_NETWORK=Preprod

# Hydra Node WebSocket URL (Publicly Accessible)
NEXT_PUBLIC_HYDRA_WS_URL=wss://f9807ef0f9a65447.hexcore.io.vn
HYDRA_WS_URL=wss://f9807ef0f9a65447.hexcore.io.vn
HYDRA_NODE_URL=https://f9807ef0f9a65447.hexcore.io.vn

# IPFS Configuration (Pinata)
NEXT_PUBLIC_PINATA_JWT=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..d5beYrGxKsiDVOMm12121PKAGofdrKhkagwsZnnqgOw

# Lighthouse Storage (Backup)
NEXT_PUBLIC_LIGHTHOUSE_API_KEY=da8fe82e.145ca9731346492daaa231377ff0a8c6

# Smart Contract Registry
NEXT_PUBLIC_REGISTRY_SCRIPT_ADDRESS=addr_test1wzn9efv2f6w82hagxqtn62ju4m293tqvw0uhmdl64ch8uwc0h43gt

# ZK Proof Configuration
NEXT_PUBLIC_ENABLE_REAL_ZK_PROOFS=true
NEXT_PUBLIC_MIDNIGHT_PROOF_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:6300
ENABLE_HYDRA_VERSION_CONTROL=true
MAX_HYDRA_COMMITS_BEFORE_PUSH=50
```

## Running the App
```bash
npm run dev
```
Open [http://localhost:3000](http://localhost:3000) in your browser.
